scripts.dev: (trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; (cd api && composer start) & (cd frontend && npm run dev))
scripts.i18n:collect: node scripts/find_translations.mjs -- $(find ./frontend/app -type f \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.jsx' -o -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -o -name '*.mjs' \)) $(find ./api/app -type f \( -name '*.php' \)) $(find ./api/routes -type f \( -name '*.php' \)) > i18n/en.json
scripts.i18n: npm run i18n:collect; for lang in de fr es it nl; do node scripts/translate.mjs --targetLanguages=$lang --sourceLanguage=en i18n/en.json; done; npm run i18n:merge
scripts._i18n: npm run i18n:setup; for lang in de fr es it nl; do php scripts/find_translations.php > i18n/$lang.json; node scripts/translate.mjs --lang=$lang i18n/$lang.json; done; npm run i18n:setup;
scripts._i18n:setup: php scripts/find_translations.php > i18n/en.json; mv i18n/en.json frontend/i18n/
